name: Nenrei's Flappy Things
description:
This is a clone of the famous Flappy Bird.

I developed this as a fun project to learn and practice.

I will add more skins, so, if you have any suggestions, please comment below.

04/02/2021 - v.0.17
Skins added:
    -Choco
    -Choco Vip
    -Crash Dummy

04/02/2021 - v.1.0.2
Features added:
    -Unlock skins by codes
    -Unlock skins by score
